name: Meter Reading
desc: 1 step Demo of the basic UI of an App and our Email capability

template.name: Meter Reading
template.desc: 1 step Demo of the basic UI of an App and our Email capability

origin.name: Meter Reading
origin.desc: 1 step Demo of the basic UI of an App and our Email capability

PROCESSTYPE.name: Meter Reading
PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML:
<definitions typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI">
    <process id="meterReading" name="Meter Reading" isExecutable="true">
        <startEvent id="startevent1" name="Start"/>
        <endEvent id="endevent1" name="End"/>
        <userTask id="usertask1" name="Meter Reading" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_releverCompteur"/>
        <serviceTask id="servicetask1" name="Read Facts" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
                    <activiti:string>poi_findtimes_fact</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
                    <activiti:expression>${listMap}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow3" sourceRef="startevent1" targetRef="servicetask1"/>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow4" sourceRef="servicetask1" targetRef="usertask1"/>
        <serviceTask id="mailtask1" name="Gas Result Email" activiti:type="mail">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="to">
                    <activiti:expression>${wf_currentAssignee}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="from">
                    <activiti:string>alert@point.io</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="subject">
                    <activiti:string>New Gas Meter Reading</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="html">
                    <activiti:expression><p>New Gas Meter Reading from ${wf_currentAssignee} :</p>
<ul>
<li>Serial Number: ${gasSerialNumber}</li>
<li>Reading: ${gasNewReading}</li>
<li>Reading Date: ${gasNewReadingDate}</li>
</ul></activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow6" sourceRef="mailtask1" targetRef="endevent1"/>
        <exclusiveGateway id="exclusivegateway1" name="Exclusive Gateway"/>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow7" sourceRef="usertask1" targetRef="exclusivegateway1"/>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow8" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="mailtask1">
            <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${wf_optionsOutcome == 'gas'}</conditionExpression>
        </sequenceFlow>
        <serviceTask id="mailtask2" name="Electricity Result Email" activiti:type="mail">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="subject">
                    <activiti:string>New Electricity Meter Reading</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="from">
                    <activiti:string>alert@point.io</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="to">
                    <activiti:Expression>${wf_currentAssignee}</activiti:Expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="html">
                    <activiti:expression><p>New Electricity Meter Reading from ${wf_currentAssignee} :</p>
<ul>
<li>Serial Number: ${elecSerialNumber}</li>
<li>Reading: ${elecNewReading}</li>
<li>Reading Date: ${elecNewReadingDate}</li>
</ul></activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow9" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="mailtask2">
            <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${wf_optionsOutcome == 'electricity'}</conditionExpression>
        </sequenceFlow>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow10" sourceRef="mailtask2" targetRef="endevent1"/>
    </process>
    <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_meterReading">
        <bpmndi:BPMNPlane bpmnElement="meterReading" id="BPMNPlane_meterReading">
            <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="startevent1" id="BPMNShape_startevent1">
                <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="230.0" y="170.0"/>
            </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
            <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="endevent1" id="BPMNShape_endevent1">
                <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="770.0" y="170.0"/>
            </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
            <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="usertask1" id="BPMNShape_usertask1">
                <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="450.0" y="160.0"/>
            </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
            <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="servicetask1" id="BPMNShape_servicetask1">
                <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="300.0" y="160.0"/>
            </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
            <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="mailtask1" id="BPMNShape_mailtask1">
                <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="620.0" y="220.0"/>
            </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
            <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="exclusivegateway1" id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway1">
                <omgdc:Bounds height="40.0" width="40.0" x="570.0" y="167.0"/>
            </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
            <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="mailtask2" id="BPMNShape_mailtask2">
                <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="620.0" y="106.0"/>
            </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
            <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow3" id="BPMNEdge_flow3">
                <omgdi:waypoint x="265.0" y="187.0"/>
                <omgdi:waypoint x="300.0" y="187.0"/>
            </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
            <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow4" id="BPMNEdge_flow4">
                <omgdi:waypoint x="405.0" y="187.0"/>
                <omgdi:waypoint x="450.0" y="187.0"/>
            </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
            <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow6" id="BPMNEdge_flow6">
                <omgdi:waypoint x="725.0" y="247.0"/>
                <omgdi:waypoint x="787.0" y="247.0"/>
                <omgdi:waypoint x="787.0" y="205.0"/>
            </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
            <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow7" id="BPMNEdge_flow7">
                <omgdi:waypoint x="555.0" y="187.0"/>
                <omgdi:waypoint x="570.0" y="187.0"/>
            </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
            <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow8" id="BPMNEdge_flow8">
                <omgdi:waypoint x="590.0" y="207.0"/>
                <omgdi:waypoint x="590.0" y="247.0"/>
                <omgdi:waypoint x="620.0" y="247.0"/>
            </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
            <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow9" id="BPMNEdge_flow9">
                <omgdi:waypoint x="590.0" y="167.0"/>
                <omgdi:waypoint x="590.0" y="133.0"/>
                <omgdi:waypoint x="620.0" y="133.0"/>
            </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
            <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow10" id="BPMNEdge_flow10">
                <omgdi:waypoint x="725.0" y="133.0"/>
                <omgdi:waypoint x="787.0" y="133.0"/>
                <omgdi:waypoint x="787.0" y="170.0"/>
            </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
        </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
    </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</definitions>
